- Ready Made Projects -

- Studio -

READYMADE PROJECTS, IS PRINCIPALLY INVOLVED IN THREE TRADITIONALLY DISTINCT MARKETS WHICH ARE CONVERGING MORE NOW THAN EVER. WE WORK IN LUXURY PACKAGING IN NEW YORK & PARIS, CONTEMPORARY HOME FURNISHINGS MOSTLY IN MILAN AND SINCE 2005, COLLABORATIVELY WITH ARTISANS IN THE “DEVELOPING WORLD” WHERE WE’RE TRYING TO BUILD A BRIDGE TO “FIRST WORLD” INTERNATIONAL DISTRIBUTION.

WE MAKE NO DISTINCTION BETWEEN PRODUCT DESIGN FOR THE CAPPELLINIS OR MISSONIS OF THE LUXURY DESIGN WORLD AND OUR COLLABORATIONS WITH SOCIALLY CONSCIOUS NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS LIKE AID TO ARTISANS AND THE NATURE CONSERVANCY.

AT READYMADE PROJECTS, WE’VE BEEN SUCCESSFUL AT CONNECTING OUR INTERNATIONALLY RECOGNIZED CLIENTS WITH SKILLED DISTINCTLY UNIQUE ARTISANS FOR WHICH WE’VE DEVELOPED PROPRIETARY COLLABORATIVE TECHNIQUES TO PRODUCE PRODUCTS THAT CONTRIBUTE TO BUILDING MICRO-ECONOMIES.

OUR CLIENTS ARE THE MOST DOMINANT LUXURY BRANDS OF THE HOME FURNISHINGS INDUSTRY TODAY, AND YET THEY WERE FOUNDED NO MORE THAN 60 YEARS AGO FROM SMALL FAMILY OWNED ARTISANAL BUSINESS IN POST-WAR ITALY. THEY RECOGNIZE THE FACT THAT FOR THE FIRST TIME IN HISTORY WITH COMMITTED INVESTMENT, WE CAN ALL HELP FOSTER THE GROWTH OF SIMILARLY INFLUENTIAL BRANDS OUT OF AFRICA, PERU OR INDIA.
